bibl.title: Some Oxford Papyri
bibl.note: 1. P. Heythrop College sans No. d'Inv. Loan of money on security of land. Oxyrhynchites, A.D. 131. - 2. P. Bodl. Ms.Gr.class. e. 129 (P). Loan of money. Arsinoites, A.D. 337. - 3. d. 143 (P). Promise to appear before the prefect, circa A.D. 324-5. - 4. Sans No. d'Inv. Sale of land. Hermopolites, reign of Justinian. - 5. d. 147 (P). Private letter. Late 3rd cent. - 6. d. 146 (P). Order for payment to Thracian horsemen. Early Ist cent. B.C. - 7. f. 107 (P). Land survey. Early 3rd cent. - 8. g. 74 (P). Customs receipt, A.D. 156. - 9. g. 75 (P). Receipt for corn. 5th-6th cent.
